entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to public comment
  • Assignee set to Andre Merzky
  • Priority changed from High to Normal

Thanks for this. It looks good, and is headed for 30-day public comment. Once it's there, please work with your constituents to solicit comments, which are a good indicator of community support.

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
This looks like a useful document and a good piece of work. If the authors would kindly update to the latest OGF document template for the copyright statement and other boilerplate text, we can put it into public comment.

    For current versions, see the attachments at https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor/wiki

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
Hi Morris,

    we realized that you used an old document template, and in particular the old IPR statement. Could you please update that again according to the template on https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor/wiki, and then upload again? Please also provide the source file (.doc?) and pdf.

    Thanks, Andre.

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action

Waiting for Morris to reply...

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

Is now in public comment (see http://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/13) Muntil August 20. Can be announced.

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to to be published

No comments were received via public comment: http://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/13

The standards council reviewed and discussed this document, and decided to go ahead and publish as GFD-I.210. Andre, please prepare the final document for publication.

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content:
• File PGI-EMI-ES-Spec_v2-0.pdf added
  • File PGI-EMI-ES-Spec_v2-0.doc added

attach final pdf and doc

entry.title: Editor - document #78: PGI - EMI Execution Service
entry.content: The document is published on http://www.ogf.org/dokuwiki/doku.php/documents/documents, and can be announced.
